title: patch update
body: i download the game than login and update reached 14% than i log out and i login again update start again from beginner until reached 64% than i got disconnect than i got message telling me to exit the game and open it to try again i did and now patch updating start from beginner again how many time i will download it and why i can't play until patch update done ??

replies.body:
It can be a little bothersome at times, but you'll need to let that download complete without interrupting it. If you close out of the installer in the middle there's a chance that the files will be corrupted which sounds like what might have happened already if the patcher is giving you errors now. 

At this point, it might be best to grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on, and this time make sure you don't close the installer before it's finished.
